item.title: Add discounts to site
item.description: Configure discounted pricing # You can either display a discount banner on your website by adding a tiny JavaScript file to your website or build a custom solution using our API Discount banners # To add discount coupons to your site, you need to add a tiny JavaScript file to your website. Please refer configure banner section for more info. Build a custom design using API # You need to purchase the PRO plan to get access to API You can access all the relevant information to build a custom solution via our API and configure the discounted pricing however you wish
